text:
"TV magazine's short intensive series."
"The members brainstorming scenarios for shooting."

"Any situation is fine. The lineup will be divided
into teams of 3, 2, and all members for each round."

Until the next meeting, we also received
homework to come up with situations for shooting!
Even though they say situation, huh...
The weather is nice, isn't it...

Ah...
Doesn't it feel warmer than earlier?

...We'll start practice soon,
but on a day like this, I'd love to go cycling somewhere...
